title: Left hand reverse mouse buttons??
body:
Hey I used to do this to fix my mouse. I am left-handed and play with the windows default setting of my primary and secondary mouse buttons reversed. League of Legends client has never acknowledged this change from the start and you had to go manually edit values to do it in the LoL files

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4821315&page=1#post49602674

I no longer see my input.ini file in the Config folder though. I don't know how to fix this. Game is unplayable with my mouse buttons backwards

How do I fix this?

replies.body: Many keys in league are reserved and can't be modified, including the mouse buttons.  We don't have an option to switch keys, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a look to see if there might be any options.  We'll reply as soon as possible!
Your tech team needs to be looking into adding a "reverse mouse buttons" checkbox in the options.

I don't understand how this has been posted by different people on forums for many years and you cannot add such checkbox in the game settings? Surely you shouldn't be neglecting the amount of people in the LoL community who are left-handed. It's really poor customer service and the fact it hasn't been adressed for years makes me wonder. Yesterday is a prime example of this happening again, with settings being defaulted and no official response being provided other than "some people had this issue". What about people losing games because their settings were changed without their knowledge?
I agree. And for me I'm right-handed but due a health issue can't use mouse with right hand. Since there is no easy way to reverse mouse buttons, it seams I'll stop playing. I wish you could fix it.

Any update on this issue? 

To give some perspective: Large group of friends basically stopped playing LoL because one of us is left handed and uses a Razor symmetrical mouse set to left hand, and it doesn't work.  The left handed 'setting' works for everything except LoL, and so over time everyone sorta uninstalled LoL because we would rather play a game that caters for said person.  I reinstalled LoL for the purpose of seeing if I can get a left handed configuration because if I can we would all start playing again.

As mentioned this has been discussed for many years in many forums, and so this is a last ditch attempt to request a proper solution.

I could not find a matching support ticket/FAQ and so I will open a new support ticket to do so.
